title: EPIC: User Management, RBAC & Subscription Payment System
Feature: Restore products page 3 target profit margin suggestions
AI: Frontend useAIChat hook + AIChat UI parity + Settings AI privacy selector
description:
Implement frontend parity with reference AIChat:
- Add useAIChat hook that calls BizPilot2 backend APIs
- Update /app/(dashboard)/ai page to support conversation list + delete + switch
- Reuse hook for GlobalAIChat or make it open the same conversation system
- Add Settings -> AI section to configure ai_data_sharing_level
- Handle loading/error/empty states and keep UI consistent

title: UX: Styled error + not-found pages and fun 'Cooking...' placeholders for unimplemented features

title: Feature: Production/Manufacturing page for creating products from ingredients
description: Add a new Production page where users can manufacture/produce products from raw ingredients. Features: 1) Select product to manufacture with its recipe/BOM 2) Specify quantity to produce 3) Automatically deduct ingredient quantities from inventory 4) Create production orders with status tracking (pending, in-progress, completed) 5) Track production history and costs 6) Handle partial productions and batch tracking

title: Phase 2.2: Create admin API endpoints for user management CRUD
Feature: Suppliers module (CRUD UI+API), seed suppliers, alembic migration
description: Add Suppliers module end-to-end. Backend: Supplier model + schemas + CRUD service + API endpoints + tests. DB: Alembic migration to create suppliers table and add indexes. Seed: add sample suppliers in seed script. Frontend: /suppliers list (default list view), /suppliers/new, /suppliers/[id], /suppliers/[id]/edit with delete support. Ensure responsive layouts/truncation like Customers.

title: Port folder: components/auth (BizPilot) -> BizPilot2 auth components parity

title: Port: OrderForm.tsx from BizPilot - reusable order form component
Bug: Google OAuth works locally but is disabled/greyed out on deployed app
description: Google OAuth works on localhost but the Google login button is disabled/greyed out on the deployed app. Google Console redirect URIs have been added, so likely prod env/config mismatch (missing GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID/GOOGLE_REDIRECT_URI/FRONTEND_URL/BACKEND_URL/CORS/HTTPS), or frontend disables button when /oauth/google/url fails. Investigate DO App Platform env + logs and frontend disable condition; fix and add regression check.

title: Bug: Frontend build fails - inventory value arithmetic uses non-numeric types
description: Next.js build fails in frontend/src/app/(dashboard)/inventory/page.tsx due to arithmetic on non-number types. Coerce quantity/cost fields to numbers and ensure formatting avoids NaN. Then rerun pnpm -C frontend build.

title: Port: EditOrderModal.tsx from BizPilot - order editing modal
Backend: Users - implement /users/me update endpoint
description:
Frontend settings page calls PUT /users/me but backend has no route.

Implement: add new FastAPI router (e.g., app/api/users.py) with prefix /users. Add PUT /users/me to update current user's profile fields (first_name,last_name,phone). Email should be read-only.

Add Pydantic schemas: UserUpdateMe, UserResponseMe.

Security: require get_current_active_user; ensure only self is updated. Validate inputs.

Tests: add backend unit tests for route existence and update behavior.

Frontend: ensure settings page handles success/failure message.

title: Port folder: components/ui (BizPilot) -> BizPilot2 UI primitives parity
description: Audit and port any missing UI primitives from BizPilot src/components/ui into BizPilot2 frontend/src/components/ui, preserving styling and API. Avoid Supabase dependencies.

title: Superadmin: manage all users across all businesses
AI: Backend APIs + Groq service + context routing + privacy enforcement
description:
Implement FastAPI AI system:
- Groq client integration server-side (no browser keys)
- /ai endpoints: conversations CRUD, messages send, context
- Context router (app-help vs business analytics)
- Enforce per-user ai_data_sharing_level (redaction + aggregation)
- Conversation history (last N messages) + title generation
- Add backend tests for authz + privacy enforcement

Reports: implement Export endpoint + wire Reports Export button
description:
Reports page has an Export button with no functionality.

Implement backend export endpoint (pick one):
- GET /reports/export?range=30d&format=csv (or xlsx)
Return downloadable file for key report stats + top lists.

Frontend: wire Export button to call endpoint, download file, and include date range selection in params.

Tests: backend endpoint existence + basic response type/headers.

title: Phase 2.3: Build admin dashboard UI - user table, CRUD actions, subscription controls
Feature: Orders split inbound (customers) vs outbound (suppliers) + email outbound orders
description: Split orders into inbound customer orders vs outbound supplier orders. Add discriminator field on orders (direction/type) and supplier_id link for outbound. Update Orders UI to show tabs/filters for inbound/outbound. For outbound orders, implement emailing the order to supplier (endpoint + UI action). Ensure tests cover direction validation and supplier email send. Coordinate with DigitalOcean migration/runbook for deploying DB changes.

title: AI: DB + migrations for conversations/messages + user_settings privacy levels
description:
Add persistent AI storage and preferences:
- Create DB models + Alembic migrations for ai_conversations + ai_messages
- Create user_settings table with ai_data_sharing_level enum (none/app_only/metrics_only/full_business/full_business_with_customers)
- Add indexes + FK constraints + cascade semantics
- Add initial service helpers + tests for model-level constraints

description: Port BizPilot CurrencySelector component and its useCurrency hook/context. Remove Supabase assumptions. Persist currency preference and expose availableCurrencies + current config (symbol/name).

title: Port: LanguageSelector.tsx (BizPilot) -> Next.js i18n selector
description: Port LanguageSelector and supporting i18n utilities from BizPilot. Ensure Next.js-compatible i18n implementation.

title: Billing/Subscription: decide backend scope + implement minimal endpoints for Settings Billing tab
description:
Settings Billing tab contains Upgrade/Add Payment Method/Billing History UI that is currently placeholder only.

Decide scope (Stripe vs manual billing).
If implementing minimal backend support:
- GET /billing/subscription (current plan)
- GET /billing/history (invoices/charges)
- POST /billing/checkout-session (upgrade)
- POST /billing/payment-method (attach)

Frontend: wire existing UI buttons to these endpoints or hide until implemented.

Security: auth required; ensure scoped to business.

Tests: endpoint existence + basic flows.

title: Phase 1.4: Generate and run Alembic migrations for subscription schema

description: Port BizPilot auth-related components (login/register widgets, OAuth UI, etc.) into BizPilot2. Replace Supabase auth with FastAPI cookie auth endpoints.

title: Feature: AI-powered ingredient suggestions when adding product ingredients
description: In product costing/pricing section, when adding ingredients: 1) AI should suggest likely ingredients based on product type and existing inventory 2) Dropdown should appear when user clicks on ingredient name input 3) Suggestions should be ranked by relevance using AI 4) Selected ingredients must link to actual products in inventory for quantity tracking

title: Orders: split Sales vs Purchases + email supplier PDF

title: Port: OrderList.tsx from BizPilot - order list with filtering and pagination
Backend: Business settings - implement update endpoint used by Settings page
description:
Frontend settings page calls PUT /businesses/current but backend does not provide this route.

Option A (recommended): implement PUT /businesses/current in a new router app/api/businesses.py (prefix /businesses) that resolves the current user's business via BusinessUser and updates editable fields (name,email,phone,address,city,country,tax_id,currency).

Option B: change frontend to use existing business endpoints (if you prefer to keep /business/*).

Add schemas: BusinessUpdateCurrent, BusinessResponse.

Security: require get_current_active_user; ensure user belongs to business and has permission (e.g., businesses:edit).

Tests: route existence + update behavior.

title: Feature: Link ingredients to inventory products for quantity tracking
description: When ingredients are selected for a product recipe, they must be linked to actual products in inventory. This enables: 1) Automatic quantity deduction when products are manufactured 2) Cost calculation based on real ingredient prices 3) Stock level warnings when ingredients are low 4) Bill of Materials (BOM) tracking

title: Implement enhanced Order Creation UI with Product/Customer selectors
description: 1. Create Reusable Selector Components: ProductSelector and CustomerSelector. 2. Upgrade OrderForm Component to use these selectors, auto-fill logic, and customer integration. 3. Create 'New Order' Page at frontend/src/app/(dashboard)/orders/new/page.tsx.

title: AI: App-help knowledge base (auto-scan then curate) + tests/quality gates
description:
Create and maintain app-help context:
- Auto-scan routes/pages for initial navigation map
- Add curated how-to guides (e.g., create invoice, record payment, add product)
- Add retrieval/selection strategy for app-help context
- Add tests for KB loader and ensure no sensitive leakage
- Run quality gates: pnpm backend:test and frontend build

title: AI: verify /ai/chat backend is configured and return meaningful errors

Frontend AI assistant uses POST /ai/chat and falls back to a generic message when service isn't configured.

Audit backend app/api/ai.py implementation: ensure it is wired, validates input, returns consistent schema, and provides clear error messages when AI provider credentials/config are missing.

Add tests that /ai/chat responds with 4xx and a helpful detail when unconfigured.
